title: 10 Outrageous Private Equity Predictions for 2020
itunes:title: 10 Outrageous Private Equity Predictions for 2020
description:
Antoine Drean, CEO at Triago, shares his thoughts on the private equity landscape this year. He says the general theme running through all of his predictions is continued secular growth in private equity.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
